net.java.jddac.jmdi.comm
Interface TransportInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
HttpTransport, HttpTransportJ2me
public interface TransportInterface

The interface for communications transports to remote hosts.

Field Summary
static JddacId LOCAL_HOST
          The local hosts address.
static JddacId REMOTE_HOST
          The remote hosts address.
 
Method Summary
 void connect(java.lang.String dest, java.lang.String ncapNetworkId)
          Connect to a remote host to send and then receive messages.
 CoderInterface getCoder()
          Get the Coder.
 MessageHandler getMessageHandler()
          Returns the MessageHandler.
 void setCoder(CoderInterface cbf)
          Set the Coder for encoding and decoding messages.
 void setMessageHandler(MessageHandler ml)
          Sets the MessageHandler for this transport.
 

Field Detail

REMOTE_HOST

static final JddacId REMOTE_HOST
The remote hosts address. This constant can by used by a constant to send a message to the server it is connecting too. The transport will convert this to the host address of the remote end of the communications link.

LOCAL_HOST

static final JddacId LOCAL_HOST
The local hosts address.

Method Detail

connect

void connect(java.lang.String dest,
             java.lang.String ncapNetworkId)
             throws java.lang.Exception
Connect to a remote host to send and then receive messages. The messages to send are retrieved by calling the message handler.

Parameters:
dest - - destination host name
ncapNetworkId - - ncapNetworkId of the local NCAP.
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - - on communication error.
See Also:
MessageHandler

setMessageHandler

void setMessageHandler(MessageHandler ml)
Sets the MessageHandler for this transport.

Parameters:
ml - - MessageHandler.

getMessageHandler

MessageHandler getMessageHandler()
Returns the MessageHandler.

Returns:
the MessageHandler for this transport.

setCoder

void setCoder(CoderInterface cbf)
Set the Coder for encoding and decoding messages.

Parameters:
cbf - - the Coder.

getCoder

CoderInterface getCoder()
Get the Coder.

Returns:
the Coder.
